thread.title: I have never sung metal before: Aishvarrya
thread.title_full: I have never sung metal before: Aishvarrya - The Times of India

author: Mrinalini Sundar
title: I have never sung metal before: Aishvarrya
text: Aishvarrya Suresh is flying high with the launch of the recently released song, Neeye Unakku Raja from the film, Thoongavanam. It is the only song in the film and Aishvarrya is happy to have rendered the number. "I got a call from Ghibran's office and they wanted me to record a song. It didn't strike me for what film I'm singing for until I read the lyrics, which had the word Thoongavanam in it. Kamal sir had already recorded the song and I was roped in a little later. It is a big deal for me because this is only my second song (Her first song was for the film, Inimey Ippadithaan), and I got a chance to work with big names in the industry," says Aishvarrya. About music composer Ghibran, she says, "He has a knack of putting you at ease. We took about two hours to record the song in Tamil and Telugu, and I ended up doing something in this song that I never knew I could do â€” to sing metal."
